variable_global_exists: With this function you can check whether a global scope variable exists or not. You supply the global variable name to check for as a string (see example code below) and the function will return true if a global variable with the given name exists or false otherwise.
The name of the global variable to check for (as a string)
The above code will check to see if the global variable called "enemy_num" exists and if it does not it is created and set a value.
